name: The Case Of Scary Shadows
description:
The Case Of Scary Shadows is a game made for the "Bears - In honor of spring" art exhibition held in Belgrade City Museum Gallery in March 2016. It is inspired by a folk belief about the beginning of spring. When the bear wakes up from his winter-long nap and goes hunting for food, he mustn't see his own shadow, because only then the spring can begin. In the game you play as a bear avoiding your shadows, while collecting acorns.

Instructions:

  • WAD / Arrows - move
  • P - pause / help
  • M - sound on / off
  • L - change quality
  • Collect acorns
  • Avoid Shadows
  • Wrap-around from side to side;
  • First honey jar gives you 4 points, next one gives you 8, then 12, 16, 20...
  • Honey jars also release bees
  • Fireflies make one shadow disappear
